categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Kalisa Gehnso was a female Human Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Human, Kalisa Gehnso was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, eventually attaining the rank of Jedi Master. Following the Great Galactic War and the resurgence of the Sith Empire, Master Gehnso returned to the ancestral Jedi homeworld Tython with the rest of the Order and helped rebuild during the Cold War, residing at the Temple there where she was troubled by the repeated attacks by the native Flesh Raiders.
